languages.text: "Ты слишком распустил свою зверушку, Маражай. Мон-кай, говорящ{mf|ий|ая} в присутствии эльдаров... ты мог бы по крайней мере зашить {mf|ему|ей} рот, чтобы не оскорблять свой слух {mf|его|ее} тявканьем".

traits.locale_text: "Ты слишком распустил свою зверушку, Маражай. Мон-кай, говорящ{mf|ий|ая} в присутствии эльдаров... ты мог бы по крайней мере зашить {mf|ему|ей} рот, чтобы не оскорблять свой слух {mf|его|ее} тявканьем — впрочем, после Обсидианового суда вряд ли можно нанести еще больше урона твоей репутации".
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "You have spoiled your pet, Marazhai. A mon-keigh that dares to speak in the presence of Aeldari... You could have at least sewn its mouth shut so as not to offend your ears with its ceaseless yapping."
languages.original_text: "Ты слишком распустил свою зверушку, Маражай. Мон-кай, говорящ{mf|ий|ая} в присутствии эльдаров... ты мог бы по крайней мере зашить {mf|ему|ей} рот, чтобы не оскорблять свой слух {mf|его|ее} тявканьем".

traits.locale_text: "You have spoiled your pet, Marazhai. A mon-keigh that dares to speak in the presence of the Aeldari... You could have at least sewed its mouth shut so as not to offend your ears with its ceaseless yapping."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "You have spoiled your pet, Marazhai. A mon-keigh that dares to speak in the presence of the Aeldari... You could have at least sewed its mouth shut so as not to offend your ears with its ceaseless yapping."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "You have spoiled your pet, Marazhai. A mon-keigh that dares to speak in the presence of Aeldari... You could have at least sewn its mouth shut so as not to offend your ears with its ceaseless yapping."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "You have spoiled your pet, Marazhai. A mon-keigh that dares to speak in the presence of Aeldari... You could have at least sewn its mouth shut so as not to offend your ears with its ceaseless yapping."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "You have spoiled your pet, Marazhai. A mon-keigh that dares to speak in the presence of Aeldari... You could have at least sewn its mouth shut so as not to offend your ears with its ceaseless yapping."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euer Haustier verwöhnt, Marazhai. Ein Chem-Pan-Sey, der es wagt, im Beisein von Aeldari zu sprechen ... Ihr hättet {mf|ihm|ihr} zumindest den Mund zunähen können, um Eure Ohren nicht durch das ewige Gekläffe zu beleidigen."
languages.original_text: "You have spoiled your pet, Marazhai. A mon-keigh that dares to speak in the presence of Aeldari... You could have at least sewn its mouth shut so as not to offend your ears with its ceaseless yapping."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Euer Haustier verwöhnt, Marazhai. Ein Chem-Pan-Sey, der es wagt, im Beisein von Aeldari zu sprechen ... Ihr hättet {mf|ihm|ihr} zumindest den Mund zunähen können, um Eure Ohren nicht durch das ewige Gekläffe zu beleidigen."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: “你把你的宠物惯坏了，玛拉斋。区区一只猴子，竟敢在艾达灵族面前说话……你本该把它的嘴缝起来，免得它没完没了地吠叫，扰人清静。”
languages.original_text: "You have spoiled your pet, Marazhai. A mon-keigh that dares to speak in the presence of Aeldari... You could have at least sewn its mouth shut so as not to offend your ears with its ceaseless yapping."

traits.locale_text: “你把你的宠物惯坏了，玛拉斋。区区一只猴子，竟敢在艾达灵族面前说话……你本该把它的嘴缝起来，免得它没完没了地吠叫，扰人清静。”
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: « Vous avez gâté votre esclave, Marazhai. Un mon-keigh qui ose parler en présence d'Aeldaris... Vous auriez au moins pu lui coudre la bouche pour préserver vos oreilles de ses glapissements incessants. »
languages.original_text: "You have spoiled your pet, Marazhai. A mon-keigh that dares to speak in the presence of Aeldari... You could have at least sewn its mouth shut so as not to offend your ears with its ceaseless yapping."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez gâté votre esclave, Marazhai. Un mon-keigh qui ose parler en présence d'Aeldaris... Vous auriez au moins pu lui coudre la bouche pour préserver vos oreilles de ses glapissements incessants. »
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: «Has malcriado a tu mascota, Marazhai. Un{mf||a} mon-keigh que se atreve a hablar en presencia de Aeldari... Por lo menos, podrías haberle cosido los labios para que su incesante verborrea no ofendiera a tus oídos».
languages.original_text: "You have spoiled your pet, Marazhai. A mon-keigh that dares to speak in the presence of Aeldari... You could have at least sewn its mouth shut so as not to offend your ears with its ceaseless yapping."

traits.locale_text: «Has malcriado a tu mascota, Marazhai. Un{mf||a} mon-keigh que se atreve a hablar en presencia de Aeldari... Por lo menos, podrías haberle cosido los labios para que su incesante verborrea no ofendiera a tus oídos».
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: 「ペットを甘やかしすぎたな、マラズハイ。アエルダリの御前で口をきくなどと…キャンキャンと絶え間なく吠える声で耳が不快にならぬよう、せめてそいつの口を縫い付けておくべきだった」
languages.original_text: "You have spoiled your pet, Marazhai. A mon-keigh that dares to speak in the presence of Aeldari... You could have at least sewn its mouth shut so as not to offend your ears with its ceaseless yapping."

traits.locale_text: 「ペットを甘やかしすぎたな、マラズハイ。アエルダリの御前で口をきくなどと…キャンキャンと絶え間なく吠える声で耳が不快にならぬよう、せめてそいつの口を縫い付けておくべきだった」
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "Evcil insanını şımartmışsın Marazhai. Aeldarilerin önünde konuşmaya cüret eden bir mon-keigh. Bari ağzını dikip kapatsaydın da bitmek bilmez boş laflarıyla kulaklarımızı rencide edemeseydi."
languages.original_text: "You have spoiled your pet, Marazhai. A mon-keigh that dares to speak in the presence of Aeldari... You could have at least sewn its mouth shut so as not to offend your ears with its ceaseless yapping."

traits.locale_text: "Evcil insanını şımartmışsın Marazhai. Aeldari önünde konuşmaya cüret eden bir mon-keigh. En azından ağzını dikip kapatsaydın keşke de bitmek bilmez boş laflarıyla kulaklarımızı rencide edemeseydi."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey
